articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Thanks to Party and Youth Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Thanks to Party and Youth Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, Tuesday sent a message of thanks to the party and youth league organizations which have trained young people to be forerunners of the era with noble spirit and beautiful traits.
					 In the message he said that the 2nd National Meeting of Young Frontrunners in Noble Traits fully demonstrated the revolutionary traits and stamina of the Korean youth.
					
					 While meeting and having a photo session with the young frontrunners who participated in the meeting, he keenly felt once again how great and precious are the feats of the great leaders who raised a matchless huge army of youths and successfully settled the youth issue for the first time in history, he said.
					
					 The noble spiritual world of youths and their beautiful traits are more precious than pearl and gem, and the growth of such admirable youths is associated with unknown efforts and devotion of the party and youth league organizations, he stressed.
					
					 Highly appreciating with satisfaction the officials of the party and youth league organizations who are cultivating the flower garden of virtue with sincerity, true to the Party's idea of attaching importance to the youth, he said: I, on behalf of the first secretary of the WPK, extend heartfelt thanks and comradely greetings to the party and youth league organizations which have trained the forerunners of the era with noble spirit and beautiful traits.
					
					 He noted that through the above-said meeting the WPK set forth the militant tasks for the young forerunners in noble traits and all other youths in the country to perform laudable feats in the van of the general offensive for accelerating the final victory.
					
					 All the party and youth league organizations across the country should spare no efforts for the youth work, an important matter vital to the prospect of the socialist motherland, holding fast to the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il's idea of attaching importance to the party, the army and the youth, he said, adding:
					
					 It is the steadfast resolution and will of the Party Central Committee to let the young people take the lead in building a thriving nation with firm reliance on them. 
					
					 He said that he would visit model units, which produce young frontrunners in noble traits, to meet and encourage such admirable youths.
					
					 He expressed belief that all the party and youth league organizations across the country would greet the 70th anniversary of the WPK with fresh achievements in the youth work and glorify the 70th anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, to be marked next year, as a grand youth festival of the great Paektusan nation.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Polish President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Polish President
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Andrzei Duda on his election as president of Poland on Tuesday.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the DPRK and Poland would grow strong in the mutual benefits and wished the president successes in his responsible work for the progress of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Ethiopia
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Ethiopia
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Mulatu Teshome, president of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message sincerely wished the president and people of Ethiopia greater successes in their work for the development and prosperity of their country and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Ethiopia would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Sri Lankan Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Sri Lankan Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Baresthu Guruge Ranjith Uyangoda, Sri Lankan Ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Sri Lankan Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Sri Lankan Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong met and had a talk with Baresthu Guruge Ranjith Uyangoda, Sri Lankan ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him Wednesday.

articles.title: National Reunification Institute Indicts Park Geun Hye for Her Thrice-cursed Treachery
articles.content:
National Reunification Institute Indicts Park Geun Hye for Her Thrice-cursed Treachery 
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute issued a white paper Wednesday indicting Park Geun Hye for the crimes she committed by pursuing confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and sycophancy and enforcing the fascist rule for the past two-odd years in office.
					 It said:
					
					 Getting hell-bent on escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen and staging north-targeted war exercises in collusion with outsiders, Park quelled the nation's desire for reunification and turned south Korea into a barren land of democracy and human rights through the revival of "yusin" dictatorship and fascist rule. These traitorous and unethical crimes can never be pardoned.
					
					 The biggest crime committed by Park is that she malignantly slandered the social system and the dignity of the DPRK and kicked up the racket of confrontation, thereby pushing the north-south ties into the lowest ebb.
					
					 Early in her office, Park revealed her confrontational nature through the "story of nuclear threat from the north". In March 2013 when the DPRK advanced the line on simultaneously developing the economic construction and the building of nuclear force, she took the lead in malignantly slandering it and has ever since continued vicious outpourings against it.
					
					 She has so far let loose on more than 350 occasions coarse invectives slandering the social system and dignity of the DPRK since she took office. This is something unprecedented in the history of the successive puppet regimes.
					
					 Park, kicking up the racket of "human rights in the north" and anti-DPRK leaflet-scattering, set it as the aim of her "north policy" to achieve the "reunification under liberal democracy" and has openly pursued confrontation of social systems. Typical of this was "great opportunity for unification" and "getting ready for reunification" much touted by her.
					
					 Another crime committed by Park is that she hurt the sovereignty and the dignity of the nation through her despicable sycophancy and treachery and brought the danger of a nuclear war by staging DPRK-targeted war drills together with foreign forces.
					
					 She left OPECON entirely to the tender mercy of the U.S. and squandered a colossal amount of money collected from the people as taxes for the purchase of American weapons.
					
					 Park's servile attitude was also manifested in her approach to her Japanese master.
					
					 Park let pro-Japanese hack writers who had the history textbooks embellishing the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea passed through screening hold important posts related to history including chairman of the committee for compiling national history book. Far from protesting against the moves of the Japanese reactionaries to revive militarism and launch reinvasion, she got zealous in kowtowing to them and conspiring with them.
					
					 Park zealously followed the strategy of Washington for establishing military hegemony over Northeast Asia through mad-cap north-targeted nuclear war drills.
					
					 For a little over 2 years in office her regime staged more than 90 north-targeted war drills of various forms in league with the U.S. Those war rehearsals assumed extremely provocative nature as they were aimed at "making preemptive surprise strike", "striking bases" and "occupying Pyongyang."
					
					 Since Park took power, the ill-famed "yusin" fascist dictatorship has been revived in all fields of south Korea.
					
					 Park suppressed the political dissident forces, progressive forces of different strata.
					
					 Park is now getting desperate in fascist violence in a bid to tide over her serious ruling crisis, a result of her crimes against the nation and misrule by enforcing the harshest rule under the pretence of security.
					
					 The crimes perpetrated by her in less than two years and a half of her office are the most disgraceful ones surpassing the ones committed by former dictators in south Korea.
					
					 Park is, indeed, shame on the Korean nation, its tragedy and a source of trouble.
					
					 Now matter how desperately she works to cover up her crimes against reunification, nation and people and prolong her remaining days, she can never conceal the crimes she perpetrated against the nation by escalating the confrontation with compatriots in the north, committing acts of treachery and spearheading north-targeted war drills.
					
					 The history and nation will never pardon the thrice-cursed crimes committed by Park against the aspiration of all Koreans and the trend of the times but certainly settle accounts with her.

articles.title: Seminar Held in Mt. Kumgang
articles.content:
Seminar Held in Mt. Kumgang
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The 2015 Seminar on Investment in Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang International Tourist Zone took place at the Mt. Kumgang on May 27.
					 The seminar briefed on a plan for the development of tourist zone, its geographical conditions and legal guarantee for investment.
					
					 Ho Ji Hwan, head of the Yantai Branch of the World Trade Association of Overseas Koreans, told KCNA: 
					
					 The scenery of the Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang international tourist zone is very beautiful. The investment in this zone will bring about good results. And it is expected to be a promising tourist destination. I know that there are some projects for its development and, therefore, will make a positive cooperation in materializing them.
					
					 Michael P. Spavor, consultant of the Paektu Culture Exchange in Britain, said:
					
					 The environment and conditions in the zone are great to be one of international tourist destinations. I looked round the Masikryong Ski Resort and Songdowon beach which are very excellent.
					
					 I am willing to take part in the work for attracting investment.

articles.title: 2015 Seminar on Investment in Int'l Tourist Zone Held
articles.content:
2015 Seminar on Investment in Int'l Tourist Zone Held 
						
 Kosong, May 27 (KCNA) -- The 2015 Seminar on Investment in Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang International Tourist Zone took place in the Mt. Kumgang, on Wednesday. 
					 Present at the briefing were members of the Committee for the Promotion of Development of Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang International Tourist Zone including its Chairman Yun Yong Sok, a delegation of the Dalian Branch of the World Trade Association of Overseas Koreans, a delegation of the Chinese Liaoning Beisida Group Co. Ltd., a delegation of the Chinese Liaoning Provincial Hubei Commerce Chamber, a delegation of the Liaoning Northeast Asia Society for Promoting Economy and Culture and a delegation of the Global Businessmen's Group Co. Ltd. for Investment of Hong Kong, China, Swedish and other foreign guests and foreign embassy officials here. 
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made there. 
					
					 Yun Yong Sok said that the DPRK government worked out a long-term master plan for developing the tourist zone in a brief span of time and is in the process of rounding off detailed plans for different areas. This zone will turn into a world tourist destination and a hub for economic and cultural exchanges before long, he added. 
					
					 The general manager of the Global Businessmen's Group Co. Ltd. for Investment of Hong Kong, China said that staying in the DPRK, he clearly learned that the Korean people have achieved successes in developing economy and improving the people's living standard. 
					
					 He expressed the belief that Mt. Kumgang will be developed into a world famous tourist destination thanks to the cooperation of famous investors of the world. 
					
					 The participants watched a video introducing the Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang International Tourist Zone and listened to speeches introducing it.

articles.title: National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest Opens in DPRK
articles.content:
National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest Opens in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The 9th national contest of sports classes from primary schools opened here with due ceremony on Wednesday.
					 The participants will compete in football, table-tennis, artistic and rhythmic gymnastics, track-and-field and swimming.
					
					 Jon Guk Man, vice-chairman of the Education Commission, made an opening address.
					
					 After the opening ceremony boys' soccer match between the Pyongyang City team and the South Hwanghae Province team took place.

articles.title: Construction of Youth Power Station Goes on Apace
articles.content:
Construction of Youth Power Station Goes on Apace
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The construction of Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station has been pushed forward in the mountainous area of Paekam County, Ryanggang Province of the DPRK.
					 When giving field guidance to the construction site of the station in April this year, supreme leader Kim Jong Un called on youth builders to complete the construction of Power Stations Nos. 1 and 2 without fail before the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 In this regard, Ri Hang Jun, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, told KCNA:
					
					 The project is difficult yet vast but there are nothing insurmountable for youth builders who have turned out in the struggle in hearty response to his call. They are ensuring an ever high rate in the construction, creating the Korean speed.

articles.title: Development of Tidal Energy Pushed Forward
articles.content:
Development of Tidal Energy Pushed Forward
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Branch Academy of Hydraulic and Marine Sciences under the DPRK State Academy of Sciences has pushed ahead with the project to develop and utilize tidal energy.
					 Paek Chang Uk, a section chief of the branch academy, told KCNA that the academy has achieved successes in prospecting and developing tidal power resources.
					
					 Upon the analysis of world trend of tidal energy development, it finished prospecting resources in the country and selected some areas favorable for building tidal power stations.
					
					 It has also compiled technical indices for new methods of constructing power stations in close cooperation with relevant units.
					
					 Meanwhile, it succeeded in developing software for rational operation of tidal power stations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S., S. Korean Authorities of Posing Nuclear Threat to DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S., S. Korean Authorities of Posing Nuclear Threat to DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article lays bare the true colors of the U.S. and south Korean puppet group as the arch criminals sparking a nuclear crisis on the Korean peninsula.
					 The nuclear issue was spawned on the peninsula and the danger of a nuclear war has steadily increased due to the sinister scenario of the U.S. to invade the DPRK and hold hegemony in Northeast Asia, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces have hyped the nuclear issue of the peninsula, while seeking to go nuclear under the U.S. patronage.
					
					 The U.S. has turned south Korea into a huge market of nukes and seriously threatened the destiny of the Korean nation by staging ceaseless nuclear war drills together with the south Korean puppet forces. History is dotted with these unpardonable nuclear crimes of the U.S. and the puppet forces. 
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which paved the way for the south Korean regime's nuclear development and helped the latter dodge the international community's criticism and pressure over its secret nuclear activities.
					
					 South Korea has every element necessary for nuclear weaponization ranging from the technology of designing and manufacturing nuclear substance and bombs to delivery means for nukes.  The U.S. and the puppet forces are getting ever more frantic in their moves to stifle the DPRK, raising a hue and cry over "threat" and "provocation" from it after shelving their criminal maneuvers for a nuclear war. This is the height of shamelessness.
					
					 They should be sternly judged by history and mankind for their nuclear war scenarios.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Moves to Seize Military Hegemony
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Moves to Seize Military Hegemony
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- U.S. Secretary of State Kerry raised a hue and cry over "provocation" and "threat" from the north, touring U.S. military bases in south Korea during his junket to it. He went the lengths of crying out for the deployment of THAAD in a bid to "deter" "provocation" from the north. 
					 It was reported that heavyweights of Lockheed Martin and scholars and a delegation of missile experts of the U.S. Department of Defense visited south Korea in top secrecy one on the heels of the other before Kerry's junket to it and discussed the issue of deploying THAAD with the puppet group and confirmed on the spot the place for its deployment. The U.S. Forces Command in south Korea was reported to have stealthily conducted the survey of the site for the deployment of THAAD in disregard for the puppet forces. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that the U.S. scenario to deploy THAAD in south Korea has entered into the phase of its implementation, after going beyond the stage of discussion.
					
					 The above-said U.S. plan was prompted by its strategic purpose to knock into shape the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance, NATO of Asian version, at any cost and build a worldwide missile shield.
					
					 It is the scenario of Washington to cope with the nuclear strike capabilities of big powers in the vicinity of the Korean peninsula with THAAD in a bid to maximize the preemptive nuclear strike capability of the U.S. and seize military hegemony in Northeast Asia and the rest of the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The DPRK can never remain a passive onlooker to the above-said scenario now that the U.S. is building the structure of confrontation with big powers around the peninsula by using Japan and south Korea as shock brigades.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Puppet FM of Decrying DPRK's Step to Bolster up War Deterrent
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Puppet FM of Decrying DPRK's Step to Bolster up War Deterrent
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, when meeting his Australian counterpart on May 21, talked nonsense that the north's acquisition of high nuclear and missile technology is posing a serious threat to south Korea and it is concerned over the test-fire of SLBM that escalated tension. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary: 
					
					 This is just like a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The south Korean puppet warmongers in league with the U.S. are working hard to realize their ambition for invading the north while threatening its sovereignty and vital rights.
					
					 No one in the world would remain a passive onlooker to the robber pouncing upon him with a dagger in hand. 
					
					 It is the fixed resolution and will of the DPRK to clearly demonstrate the tremendous muscle of Songun Korea before the U.S. and the puppet group of traitors running wild like wolves to react against the DPRK's legitimate exercise of sovereignty for self-defense, and root out the source of aggression and war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 No matter what invectives traitor Yun Pyong Se and other war servants of foreign forces may let loose against the DPRK, this will get them nowhere.
					
					 The DPRK will further bolster up war deterrent for self-defense in order to protect itself from the aggression of hostile forces and pave a wide avenue to hewing out the independent destiny of the nation.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Painting Evidence of Its Past Crimes as World Cultural Heritages
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Painting Evidence of Its Past Crimes as World Cultural Heritages
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The relations between the DPRK and Japan, geographically very close to each other, are getting strained, failing to come to the terms of reconciliation. Japan is wholly to blame for this, Minju Joson Wednesday says in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Had Japan honestly admitted the crimes it perpetrated in the past against the Korean people, made an apology and reparation for them, its relations with the DPRK would have already been normalized.
					
					 Far from redeeming its past, Japan is rubbing salt into the wounds of the Korean people, as evidenced by its shameless bid to have its industrial establishments in the modern times registered as world cultural heritage.       Koreans bear the towering grudge toward those facilities.
					
					 Japan's move to showcase such places as "pride of Japan" and have them under the protection of humankind is, indeed, another unbearable insult to the Korean nation.
					
					 Lurking behind its move to do so, far from reflecting on its past history this year marking 70 years since its defeat, is a cynical ploy to persistently deny its past crime-woven history, embellish it as the one that contributed to the development of human culture, completely erase the traces of crimes and thus evade its responsibility for redeeming its past crimes.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Urges Authorities to Oppose U.S. Projected Deployment of THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Urges Authorities to Oppose U.S. Projected Deployment of THAAD 
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People in an editorial urged the puppet authorities to oppose the U.S. deployment of THAAD.
					 The editorial accused the U.S. secretary of State of openly asserting the deployment of THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 The assertion clearly proves that the U.S. is making the deployment of THAAD in south Korea an established fact, giving the lie to the "government's" assertion that there has been neither request nor discussion nor decision on the issue of the deployment of THAAD so far, it said, adding: 
					
					 The Park Geun Hye's "government" should clarify its negative stand on the deployment of THAAD, though belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Demands Authorities Lift "May 24 Step" and Ensure Joint National Events
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Demands Authorities Lift "May 24 Step" and Ensure Joint National Events
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo on May 25 in an editorial demanded the authorities lift the "May 24 step" and ensure joint national events. 
					 The editorial recalled that representatives of the South, North and Overseas Sides Committees for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a meeting in Shenyang, China early in May at which they agreed to jointly promote the south-north joint events to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					
					 However, the barrier called "May 24 step" blocks the joint national events, the editorial held, adding: The Park Geun Hye regime insisted on the "story about the sinking of warship Cheonan by the north" and pushed for the north's "recognition" and "apology" as preconditions. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye promised a drastic switchover in the "policy towards the north" but she has maintained a tougher attitude, driving the south-north relations into a catastrophe. 
					
					 What is more serious is that the present regime and the "Saenuri Party" claimed that it is impossible to lift the "May 24 step" under the present situation. This was a reckless behavior self-revealing that the Park Geun Hye regime is a country-selling and anti-reunification one. 
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime should lift the "May 24 step" at once and immediately allow the joint national events agreed upon by NGOs.

articles.title: Representative of S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Again Censured by Public
articles.content:
Representative of S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Again Censured by Public 
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- As already reported, when Kim Mu Song, representative of the south Korean "Saenuri Party", appeared at the memorial all-night vigil for Kwangju popular uprisers, its participants seized him with his collar and poured water on him. He was kicked out of it to become a laughing stock of them.
					 He, however, appeared at the memorial service held at Pongha Village in Kimhae of South Kyongsang Province, on May 23 on the death anniversary of former south Korean "President" Roh Moo Hyun only to be drenched with water poured by its participants. 
					
					 When the October 4 declaration was adopted, traitor Lee Myung Bak and the coteries of the then "Grand National Party" slandered Roh as a "Red who masterminded drain on resources for the north" and "spokesman for the Workers' Party of the north" in a bid to quench the sentiments mounting high among the south Korean people to support the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 They put pressure upon Roh by branding him as a "wire-puller" of the public candle-light actions opposing the import of U.S. beef and cooking up such conspiratorial cases as leakage of Chongwadae's recorded minutes of talks and illicit fund case, driving him to death.
					
					 The son of Roh, disillusioned with Kim's shameless presence, shouted at him that neither apology nor reflection was necessary.
					
					 He denounced the ruling party for failing to reflect on its act of driving his father to death and stamping out a small party and meeting its own interests by abusing power.
					
					 He disclosed that the ruling party opened to public the minutes of the south-north summit and hurled the Intelligence Service into a red herring operation to eliminate the "followers of the north" in a bid to win the "presidential election."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Bangladeshi Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Bangladeshi Figure 
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea could become an invincible party with strong sense of independence undeterred by any storms and ordeals of the history thanks to the tested leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Il. 
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, said this in a statement on May 20. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il systematized the Juche idea into the guiding idea indicating the way in the era of independence from the very day of his start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK. 
					
					 He developed the WPK into the invincible one leading the cause of independence of the popular masses to victory with the Juche idea created by President Kim Il Sung as the unique guiding idea. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will surely win victory in the drive for defending the socialist homeland and building a reunified thriving country under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support DPRK's Test-fire of SLBM
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support DPRK's Test-fire of SLBM
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on May 21 in support of the DPRK's test-fire of SLBM.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in the test-fire of SLBM.
					
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, watched the test-fire of SLBM.
					
					 The news immediately touched off clamorous rhetoric from the U.S. imperialists, the Japanese reactionaries and the south Korean puppet forces. 
					
					 Although the imperialists and the reactionaries say this or that about the DPRK's test-fire of SLBM, it will get them nowhere.
					
					 The DPRK's recent test-fire is another historical victory in the Songun revolution.
					
					 If the warmongers invade the DPRK, they will ruin in fire.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, the Japanese reactionaries and the south Korean puppet forces should clearly know this.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Holidays to Be Celebrated in Benin
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Holidays to Be Celebrated in Benin
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A Beninese national preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and founding of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed in Cotonou on May 20.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize political and cultural events including joint meetings and film shows on the occasion of the anniversaries.

articles.title: Iranian Paper Introduces June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Iranian Paper Introduces June 15 Joint Declaration 
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Iran News on May 20 carried an article titled "Echo of June 15 on Korean peninsula" to mark the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The paper elaborated on how the June 15 joint declaration came to be adopted.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 No sooner had the declaration been opened to public than it won positive support and sympathy from the broad international community as well as the Korean nation and there followed a dramatic change in the cause of Korea's reunification.
					
					 Inter-Korean dialogue and negotiations were held in various fields and good achievements were made for reconciliation, unity, cooperation and exchange.
					
					 Such radical changes in the north-south relations are attributable to the joint declaration that affirmed national reunification and co-prosperity by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Beninese Personages Laud Great Leaders of DPRK
articles.content:
Beninese Personages Laud Great Leaders of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Beninese personages praised the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, made the following speech at the inaugural ceremony of a Beninese national preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) held in Cotonou on May 20:
					
					 Kim Il Sung led the 20 year-old hard-fought anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to achieve the historic cause of Korea's liberation and founded the WPK that organizes and guides all victories of the Korean people.
					
					 Under the leadership of the WPK democratic reforms were successfully enforced in the DPRK in a short period after the liberation. Accordingly, a genuine people's government was established and workers became the masters of factories and farmers could have their own land.
					
					 The Korean people, being genuine masters of state and society, came to enjoy an independent and creative life.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a socialist society which is like a harmonious whole.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and rector of Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin, said the revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il have been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He praised Kim Jong Un for working in an innovative and creative way to lead the building of a thriving socialist country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Peru 
						
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The May issue of the Peruvian paper Accion Nacionalista carried a special write-up on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 The article titled "Cause of independence and Kim Jong Il" was illustrated with his photo. 
					
					 The article said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, prominent statesman, victoriously led the struggle of the Korean people and the world progressives for the cause of independence. 
					
					 With his deep insight into the urgent requirement of the era in his early years he enriched the Juche idea, which was created by President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 He reviewed 100-year history of the development of the revolutionary idea of the working class and comprehensively indicated the principles of the Juche idea. 
					
					 He saw to it that the Juche idea was made the revolutionary and scientific idea and the banner of advance and victory of the cause of independence. 
					
					 He attached importance to unity in accomplishing the cause of independence all the time and achieved the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses on the highest level, regarding the unity as the basic cornerstone of the revolution. 
					
					 He developed the WPK into the invincible one and always put forward the party and the army in the van of the revolutionary struggle. 
					
					 He wisely led the work to model the whole society on the Juche idea and closely united the entire people around the party and the leader. 
					
					 He gave priority to the ideological and political work and further strengthened the driving force of the revolution through the ideological work.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al nuevo presidente polaco
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al nuevo presidente polaco 
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 26 un mensaje de felicitacion al recien electo presidente de la Republica de Polonia Andrzej Duda. 
					Convencido de que las relaciones entre los dos paises se desarrollaran conforme a los intereses mutuos, el remitente desea al destinatario exitos en su trabajo para el progreso del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita Dia Nacional de Etiopia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita Dia Nacional de Etiopia
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este miercoles un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Federal Democratica de Etiopia, Mulatu Teshome, con motivo del Dia Nacional de este pais. 
					El remitente desea de todo corazon al mandatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en sus labores para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais y expresa conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador de Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador de Sri Lanka
						
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- Baresthu Guruge Ranjith Uyangoda presento este miercoles en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, las cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Democratica Socialista de Sri Lanka en la RPDC.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Instituto de Reunificacion de la Patria condena crimenes de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Instituto de Reunificacion de la Patria condena crimenes de Park Geun-hye
						
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria publico el dia 27 una carta blanca revelando los crimenes cometidos por Park Geun-hye durante 2 anos y pico de su mandato.
					La carta senala que Park pisoteo la aspiracion de la nacion a la reunificacion entregandose en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas a la confrontacion fratricida y los ejercicios belicos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y convirtio el suelo surcoreano en el infierno de la democracia y los derechos humanos mediante el renacimiento de la dictadura de "Yusin" (renovacion) y la gobernacion fascista y continua:
					
					El mayor crimen de Park es que calumnio brutalmente el sistema y la dignidad de la RPDC y llevo a la coyuntura catastrofica las relaciones intercoreanas con las locuras de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Desde el primer periodo de su mandato, Park Geun-hye revelo su naturaleza conflictiva tramando alboroto de la "amenaza nuclear del Norte", difamo con intencion malsana la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares publicada en marzo de 2013 por la RPDC y hoy tambien no deja de soltar tales maldiciones. 
					
					Desde la toma del poder hasta la fecha, Park lanzo en mas de 350 ocasiones las palabras difamantes al regimen y la dignidad de la RPDC. 
					
					Entregandose a la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC y al lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC, presento como meta de su "politica sobre el Norte" la "unificacion bajo el sistema democratico y liberal" y ha venido persiguiendo abiertamente el enfrentamiento de regimenes.
					
					Lo mas representativo es "Thong-il Taebak (cajon de tesoro para la unificacion)" y los "preparativos de unificacion".
					
					Con el acto servil a grandes potencias, Park atento a la soberania y la dignidad de la nacion y acarreo el peligro de guerra nuclear mediante las maquinaciones de agresion al Norte junto con las fuerzas ajenas.
					
					Entrego completamente a su amo gringo el mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra e invirtio fabulosos fondos para la compra de armas de marca norteamericana.
					
					La actitud humillante de Park se manifesto tambien al tratar a su amo japones.
					
					Designo en los cargos importantes del sector relativo a la historia a los escritores venales projaponeses que aprobaron en el examen los libros de historia que embellecen la gobernacion colonial del imperio japones. Confabula mas con los reaccionarios japoneses en vez de cuestionar sus maquinaciones tendentes a resucitar el militarismo y reagredir.
					
					Desarrollando freneticamente los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de agresion anti-RPDC, Park se sumo mas que nunca a la estrategia del imperio de tomar la hegemonia militar sobre la region del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Durante 2 anos y pico de su gobernacion, Park libro en mas de 90 ocasiones en conspiracion con EE.UU. los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC de caracter muy provocativo tales como "ataque preventivo e inesperado", "golpe al lugar de provocacion" y "ocupacion de Pyongyang".
					
					Park resucito totalmente el sistema de dictadura fascista de "Yusin" y reprimio a sus opositores politicos y las fuerzas progresistas de diversos estratos.
					
					Ahora, Park recurre mas freneticamente a la represion fascista para evadir  la severa crisis causada por su crimen antinacional y politica antipopular. 
					
					Los delitos de Park cometidos hasta la fecha superan a los crimenes de los dictadores antecedentes del Sur de Corea. 
					
					　Sin duda alguna, Park es la verguenza y la tragedia de la nacion coreana.
					
					Park se desespera para encubrir sus crimenes anti-reunificacion, antinacional y antipopular, pero nunca podra ocultarlos con nada aunque se entregue a la confrontacion fratricida y actos serviles a las grandes potencias y entrenamiento de guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					La historia y la nacion coreana nunca perdonaran los crimenes de Park que se opuso mas astutamente a la aspiracion de los connacionales y la corriente de la epoca y liquidaran sin falta la cuenta final.
